ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")) && OwnerId = "00G70000001Y5aq" && Client_Load_Received__c && ISPICKVAL(Case_Lookup__r.Service_Location__c, "Detroit Branch 0050") && NOT( Client_Load_Complete__c )
